1. Evans Blue dye

Evans Blue dye is a chemical compound used as a dye in biological research, particularly in the study of blood-brain barrier permeability. It is a sodium salt of triphenylmethane-3,3'-diol-2,2'-disulfonic acid, and its chemical formula is C19H14N2O7S2Na.
